item.title: Setting Up Oracle JDK On GNU/Linux
item.description: Java SE is an abbreviation for Java Platform, Standard Edition, and JDK is an abbreviation for Java SE Development Kit. JDK provides running environment for Java applications. This article documents how to set up Oracle JDK on GNU/Linux, then implement the entire process through Shell script.
